mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movBoard (name, contents, runtime, imgpath) VALUES (#{name}, #{contents}, #{runtime}, #{imgpath})
mapper.select: SELECT mid, name, contents, runtime, viewcnt, regdate, updatedate, imgpath FROM movBoard where mid = #{mid}
mapper.update: UPDATE movBoard SET name = #{name}, contents = #{contents}, runtime = #{runtime}, imgpath = #{imgpath} where mid=#{mid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM movBoard order by regdate desc LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_file(fullName, bno) values (#{fullName}, LAST_INSERT_ID())
